name: tiktok-engine
description: Programmatic TikTok/Reels video engine powered by Remotion â€” multi-voice TTS, auto-captions, iMessage screens, notification UIs, and AI video backgrounds

scripts.reencode: ffmpeg -y -i out/raw.mp4 -c:v libx264 -pix_fmt yuv420p -color_range tv -colorspace bt709 -color_primaries bt709 -color_trc bt709 -crf 18 -preset fast -profile:v high -level 4.1 -c:a aac -b:a 128k -movflags +faststart -map_metadata -1 out/final.mp4
scripts.build: npm run render && npm run reencode
